reuze.pending

Class EmptyEnvironmentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • reuze.pending.AgentAppEnvironmentView
            • reuze.pending.EmptyEnvironmentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, aa_i_EnvironmentView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapAgentView

    public class EmptyEnvironmentView
extends AgentAppEnvironmentView
    Simple graphical environment view without content but with some useful transformation features. The transformation features allow to scale and translate 2D world coordinates into view coordinates. When creating subclasses, it should normally be sufficient to override the method paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics).
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void adjustTransformation(double minXW,
                        double minYW,
                        double maxXW,
                        double maxYW)
        Specifies a bounding box in world coordinates. The resulting transformation is able to display everything within this bounding box without scrolling.
